channel.title: Metal Metal Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: The most metal metal podcast out there.
channel.itunes:author: Matt Taylor & Jeff Brown
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast was founded by metal fans Jeff Scott Brown and Matt Taylor. We've been damaging our eardrums with thrashing heavy metal for decades. In each podcast, we'll explore our metal libraries to bring you hidden gems of pounding, chunky, raw walls of sound. Jeff is an aficionado of classic bands like Black Sabbath and Slayer, but his knowledge of the metal genre is broad and deep. Progressive rock and heavy metal is Jeff's forte. Matt gets his metal kicks from droning heavy stoner and doom metal. Whether it's the unrelenting hum of Sleep or the raw power of Clutch, he'll bring you a serious metal fix. But we're not one trick ponies. Get ready to hear us explore all genres of metal.
channel.description: This podcast was founded by metal fans Jeff Scott Brown and Matt Taylor. We've been damaging our eardrums with thrashing heavy metal for decades. In each podcast, we'll explore our metal libraries to bring you hidden gems of pounding, chunky, raw walls of sound. Jeff is an aficionado of classic bands like Black Sabbath and Slayer, but his knowledge of the metal genre is broad and deep. Progressive rock and heavy metal is Jeff's forte. Matt gets his metal kicks from droning heavy stoner and doom metal. Whether it's the unrelenting hum of Sleep or the raw power of Clutch, he'll bring you a serious metal fix. But we're not one trick ponies. Get ready to hear us explore all genres of metal.

item.title: The First Metal Metal Podcast
item.itunes:author: Matt Taylor & Jeff Brown
item.itunes:subtitle: Turn up the volume!
item.itunes:summary: We introduce ourselves and this podcast, then rock out to Danzig, Slayer, Manilla Road, and more.

item.title: Jeff's Bloody Mosh Pit Experience
item.itunes:author: Matt Taylor & Jeff Brown
item.itunes:subtitle: Turn up the volume!
item.itunes:summary: Jeff tells a depressing story. Then he tells an awesome one. Also, we listen to metal.

item.title: The Lost Valentine's Day Episode
item.itunes:author: Matt Taylor & Jeff Brown
item.itunes:subtitle: Turn up the volume!
item.itunes:summary: We debate whether Soundgarden is a metal band. Jeff gets into Sepultur and Iced Earth details. Matt talks about occult Lovecraftian horror.
